com.echsylon.atlantis

Interface Atlantis.TransformationHelper

  • Enclosing class:
    Atlantis

    public static interface Atlantis.TransformationHelper
    This interface describes the API offering means for preparing a request either for the real world or the mock environment. Atlantis will make sure any injected implementation of this interface is called when needed and possible, e.g. there needs to be "fallbackBaseUrl" defined in the configuration for this transformation to take place.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MockResponse prepareForMockedWorld(String realBaseUrl, MockResponse recordedResponse)
      Returns a new mock response which doesn't reference any real life resources, but targets internal, mocked, alternatives only.
      MockRequest prepareForRealWorld(String realBaseUrl, MockRequest mockRequest)
      Returns a new mock request which doesn't reference any features in the mock environment.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareForRealWorld

        MockRequest prepareForRealWorld(String realBaseUrl,
                                MockRequest mockRequest)
        Returns a new mock request which doesn't reference any features in the mock environment. This indirectly requires any implementing classes to know of the "real world".
        Parameters:
        realBaseUrl - The base url of the real server.
        mockRequest - The unchanged mock request as Atlantis knows it.
        Returns:
        A modified mock request which has all internal URL's and mock references replaced with corresponding real world values. Since the MockRequest is immutable (-ish), implementing classes must create and return a new instance, preferably by using a MockRequest.Builder).

      • prepareForMockedWorld

        MockResponse prepareForMockedWorld(String realBaseUrl,
                                   MockResponse recordedResponse)
        Returns a new mock response which doesn't reference any real life resources, but targets internal, mocked, alternatives only.
        Parameters:
        realBaseUrl - The base url of the real server.
        recordedResponse - The mock response as recorded from the real world response.
        Returns:
        A modified mock response which has all external URL's and mock references replaced with corresponding mock values. Since the MockResponse is immutable (-ish), implementing classes must create and return a new instance, preferably by using a MockResponse.Builder).
